name: Tennis
title: One of the most popular game at this time
benifits: increasing aerobic capacities. lowering resting heart rate and blood pressure. improving metabolic function. increasing bone density. lowering body fat.improving muscle tone strength and flexibility. increasing reaction times

name: Cricket
title: The gentleman game
benifits: Although there is some standing around, to play cricket you need to be fit and strong, and have good hand-eye coordination and ball-handling skills. Cricket involves sprinting between wickets and running to stop balls, as well as bowling and throwing.

name: Football
title: No 1 popular game in the world
benifits: Improves Aerobic Capacity, Improves Cardiovascular Health , Lowers Body Fat and Improves Muscle Tone,  Builds Muscle Strength, Increases Bone Strength, Teaches Coordination, Promotes Teamwork and Sharing, Increases Cognitive Brain Function

name: Boxing
title: Prove your mucles straingth
benifits: Boxing can help improve your heart health, body composition, and strength, as well as lower your blood pressure and aid weight loss. Most of all, boxing is a fun way to get some exercise and release stress in a safe and healthy way.

name: Swiming
title: Swim everyday fit alltime
benifits: As well as being fun, swimming is a great way to keep fit and make friends.Swimming is a healthy activity that you can continue for a lifetime. Swimming is a low-impact activity that has many physical and mental health benefits.Make sure you know how to swim and do so in a safe environment.
